name: lancyy-ai-content-moderation
description: AI Content Moderation System - Full Stack Application
author: Lance Cabanit (Lancyy)

scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && serve -s frontend/build -l 3001
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.build:production: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
